message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know the money loses value over time, so I should get a bit more to make it worthwhile. This offer benefits us both!

Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor.  Let's be reasonable. This offer gives me a slight advantage, acknowledging the time-value of money.  It's a good deal for both of us if we settle now.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. This is a fair 50/50 split.  I'm losing money with every round, and I'm sure you see the value in ending this quickly.
